section.section:
All forms of statements, receipts, and agreements used by licensees must be filed with and approved by the Commissioner as:
conforming to the requirements of this section;
not inconsistent with law; and
not misleading in any way.

The Commissioner may disapprove a form if the Commissioner finds that the form:
contains any provision or any title, heading, backing, or other indication of its contents that is likely to be misleading; or
omits any provision that the Commissioner requires to make the form clear and not misleading.
